settings.title: temperatur.nu settings
settings.subtitle: Use an app name for unsigned calls to temperatur.nu API. Number of unsigned calls is limited to 20 per hour.

about.title: About this app
about.li1: Temperatures used in this app comes from <a href='http://temperatur.nu'>temperatur.nu
about.li2: It is only possible to create one device that fetches data from API every five minutes. This might change in the future.
about.li3: The app name is generated when the app is run for the first time, but can be changed by the user. <u>This cannot be empty.</u>
